Text: Private Equity Transactions and LJM From A Fastow Cc Please note that LJM CoInvestment LP LJM is no longer a related party for purposes of disclosure in Enrons proxy and financial statements Transactions may occur with LJM as with any other unrelated third party Andy Fastow EVPCFO ENRON

Mandates Cc To Legal Finance and Corporate Development Personnel Cc Enron Executive Committee From Andy Fastow All mandates for mergers and acquisitions and finance work must be approved and executed by Jeff Donahue or Ben Glisan respectively Please advise your business units if appropriate of this procedure
